name: Window Checklist
Subframe Installation
Sub frame material delivered to site free of defects
Check Grid references, setouts etc for correct installation location
Opening accepted as "ready for subframe installation" i.e. waterproofed, water stop angles, plinths etc
Reference shop drawings for correct subframing material, fixing type & spacings and FFLs where there is zero clearance to sliding doors.
Overseal sill fixings, install end dams and carry out flood test
Frame Installation
Frames are free of defects with protection tape applied
Handing's of unit are correct as per shop drawing
Drainage weep holes are free of any debris
Ensure frames to be assembled onsite are square, sealed and all components are installed.
External angle trims installed
Locks/hardware installed
Glass Installation
Ensure Glass is free from defects (report glass defects to the PM immediately)
Ensure glass and frame components are free from contaminating material/substances
Setting blocks installed to support full weight of glass
Gaskets and seals are installed where needed
Commissioning
General inspection to ensure units are clean, operational and free from defects.
Flyscreens, flydoors, security doors installed where applicable
Decals installed where applicable
Window Checklist
Subframe installation
Opening accepted
Subframe installed, fixings at correct centres and over sealed, end damns installed and sealed - Photo required
Frame Installation
Drainage weep holes are free of any debris
Frame Installed - Photo required
Glass
Glass installed and rubbered where applicable - Photo required
Commissioning
General inspection to ensure Units are clean, operational and free from defects.
Floor Plan
Floor plan attached
